article_node.title: Ryght AI Partners with Global CRO Biorasi to Deliver AI-Powered Feasibility Solutions to Biotech and Biopharma Sponsors
article_node.summary: Ryght AI has partnered with CRO Biorasi to integrate its AI‑powered platform of digital twins for clinical research sites, offering sponsors real‑time, data‑driven site selection, feasibility, and enrollment forecasting. The collaboration promises to cut feasibility timelines from months to under three weeks, improve enrollment accuracy, reduce cost overruns, and accelerate study startup across dermatology, oncology, neurology, and nephrology. By automating feasibility workflows and providing continuously updated site profiles, the partnership aims to transform trial planning from guesswork into precise, AI‑guided decision making.
